alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON, BERKELEY AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 514 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Magnolia Gardens, or over North Charleston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... North Charleston, Mount Pleasant, Goose Creek, Hanahan, Naval Weapons Station Charleston, Downtown Charleston, West Ashley and Daniel Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Charleston; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley
